channel.title: weekend travel on Dev Utkarsh
channel.description: Recent content in weekend travel on Dev Utkarsh

item.title: Wayanad - Kerala
item.description: LIFE IS EITHER A DARING ADVENTURE OR NOTHING. There was a time when I wanted to escape office. It was a weekend of November 2015 and we had no plans. Recently one of my friends had shifted to Mysore for work. So I asked my flatmate & friend Aprit, if he is interested in visiting traveling to Mysore to meet our common friend Adarsh. We left at night and took an early morning train from Yeshwantpur Railway Station, Bangalore to Mysore.
